title: Document Chunking Exercise
description: Implement optimal document chunking with overlap
instructions:
Implement the `chunkDocument` function that:
1. Splits text into chunks of approximately `chunkSize` characters
2. Maintains `overlap` characters between consecutive chunks
3. Avoids splitting in the middle of words
4. Returns an array of chunk strings

Example:
chunkDocument('The quick brown fox...', 20, 5)
// Should return chunks with ~20 chars each, 5 char overlap
hints: Use a while loop to process the text from start to end
Calculate the end position as min(start + chunkSize, text.length)
Move start forward by (chunkSize - overlap) each iteration
Handle the last chunk carefully to avoid negative indices
